ARABIC: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِىٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُونِ أَهْدِكُمْ سَبِيلَ ٱلرَّشَادِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The man who had iman said, 'My people! follow me and I will guide you to the path of rectitude.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The man who believed said: "O my people, follow me; I will guide you to the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The person endowed with faith said: “My people, follow me; I shall direct you to the Path of Rectitude.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The believing man said, "My people, follow me and I shall show you the right guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the believer said, “O my people! Follow me, I shall show you the way of righteousness.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the man who believed said: "O my people! Follow me, I will guide you to the way of right conduct."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And he who believed said: O my people! follow me, I will guide you to the right course;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then said he who believed, 'My people, follow me, and I will guide you in the way of rectitude.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he who believed said: O my people! Follow me. I will show you the way of right conduct.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The believer said, "My people, follow me! I will guide you to the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And he who believed said: O my people! follow me, I shall guide you to the path of rectitude,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And he who had faith said, ‘O my people! Follow me; I will guide you to the way of rectitude.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The man who believed said further: "O my people! Follow me: I will lead you to the Path of Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the man who believed said: "O my people! Follow me, I will guide you to the way of right conduct [i.e. guide you to Allah's religion of Islamic Monotheism with which Musa (Moses) has been sent].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He who was a believer said: 'Follow me, my nation, so that I may guide you to the Right Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The one who had believed said, “O my people, follow me, and I will guide you to the path of rectitude.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he who believed said, "O my people, follow me, I will guide you to the way of right conduct.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:38] And he who believed, ‘O my people! Follow me (read ittabi‘ūnī, with the [final long] yā’, or ittabi‘ūni, without); I will guide you to the way of rectitude ([a similar statement] has already been mentioned [verse 29, above]).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he who believed) i.e. Ezekiel (said: O my people! Follow me) follow my religion. (I will show you the way of right conduct) I will invite you to the Truth and guidance.
